rect.name: darnui_strings
rect._hlp_intro: This page contains settings for the ui. When the game starts, these values will be read from hudmainmenu_config.xml. Changes will be lost when you exit the game, so take a screenshot or make a note of the settings you wish to keep.
rect._hlp_compass_width: Adjust compass width. Note that frame width is static. (_cw)
rect._hlp_compass_frame: Toggles display of the compass frame. (_cshow_frame)
rect._hlp_poi_reveal: Distance in feet at which POI icons on the compass become visible (default 12000). (_reveal)
rect._hlp_qm: Toggles display of quest markers in the compass. (_cshow_questtarget)
rect._hlp_pm: Toggles display of the player marker in the compass. (_cshow_playermarker)
rect._hlp_dl: Toggles display of visited (fast travel enabled) locations in the compass. (_cshow_discovered)
rect._hlp_kl: Toggles display of known (fast travel disabled) locations in the compass. (_cshow_known)
rect._hlp_me: Toggles display of active magic effects. (_etvisible)
rect._hlp_me_pos: Magic Effects position. Make sure there's room for all icons to the left and/or below (depends on Per Row setting). (_aex, _aey)
rect._hlp_perrow: How many icons to display per row. The game limits this to 8 at once. (_aeipr)
rect._hlp_at: Toggles display of the arc timer above the effect icon. (_arctimer)
rect._hlp_tt: Toggles display of the text timer above the effect icon. (_showcdtext)
rect._hlp_li: Toggles display of the current location info. (_showlocinfo)
rect._hlp_li_pos: Adjust position of the current location info. (_lx, _ly)
rect._hlp_li_frame: Toggles display of the current location info frame. (_showlocframe)
rect._hlp_hudscale: Global scale value for hud elements. (_hudscale)
rect._hlp_gfx_hudalpha: Global alpha value for gfx hud elements. (_gfx_hudalpha)
rect._hlp_txt_hudalpha: Global alpha value for text hud elements. (_txt_hudalpha)
rect._hlp_sb: Toggles display of the status bars. (_sbvisible)
rect._hlp_sb_fade: Toggles auto fade for the Status Bars. When on, the bars will fade as they fill up (depends on Autofade Cutoff). (_status_autofade)
rect._hlp_sb_co: When a status bar should disappear. If set to 120, the bar will be 20% visible when it is full. Set to 80, and you won't see the bar at all until it is below 80% full. (_sbco)
rect._hlp_sb_pos: Adjust position of the staus bars. (_statusallx, _statusally)
rect._hlp_wi: Toggles display of the weapon icon. (_wep_visible)
rect._hlp_wi_pos: Adjust position of the weapon icon. (_wepx, _wepy)
rect._hlp_durability: Toggles display of the durability bar. (_durbarvisible)
rect._hlp_si: Toggles display of the spell icon. (_miv)
rect._hlp_si_pos: Adjust position of the spell icon. (_mix, _miy)
rect._hlp_level: Toggles display of the level up icon. (_liv)
rect._hlp_level_pos: Adjust position of the level up icon. (_lix, _liy)
rect._hlp_se: Toggles display of the sneak eye. (_sivisible)
rect._hlp_se_pos: Adjust position of the sneak eye. (_sneak_x, _sneak_y)
rect._hlp_3pch: Toggles display of the crosshair in third person mode. All activation icons will also be displayed apart from the essential and talk icons. (_ch3rdperson)
rect._hlp_ehb: Toggles display of the enemy/npc health bar. (_ehbvisible)
rect._hlp_he: Hides the status of essential characters and displays just the regular talk icon. (_hide_essential)
rect._hlp_msg: Toggles display of game notices like "You found...", "Game saved", etc. (_msg)
rect._hlp_msg_pos: Adjust the position of the game notices. Text is automatically left or right aligned depending on which half of the screen it resides on. (_msg_x, _msg_y)
rect._hlp_msg_ca: Center aligns notice text. Useful if you want the text centered in relation to another hud element. (_msg_ca)
rect._hlp_msg_gi: Toggles display of the generic Oblivion icon used with notices lacking a specific icon. (_msg_gi)
rect._hlp_step: Global increment and decrement value for all position controls (1-100). Lower if you want to fine tune an elements position.
